page.title: 01POLEBROOK VILLAGE
page.content: My name is Verity. I live in Polebrook and I go to Polebrook C.E. Primary School. On Monday nights Brownies are held in the school hall. In the school there are seventy two children and four teachers. On a Friday we go swimming in the Oundle Pool. After school on Friday there is a chess club. Polebrook has a pub and a youth club. I live in an old cottage next door to Polebrook church. It is very pretty. Mr. Mace is the rector. We have a bus stop, but there is a bus only once a week. The milkman, postman and paper boys come every day and at school we have a library van that comes once a week.
